name: Project Rollerz
description:
Welcome to Rolling Nation, the bigger illegal rollerskater tournament ever! You are the the newest competitor in this dangerous game! Go into busy streets, beat other's score, expand your gang and be the best skater in the circuit! Are you ready for this?

*This game is in early state of developmemt. All the features shown here are a proof of concept and may not be included in the current build of the game.*
